sayohatni tashkil qilish: flight on a plane rented for special use = maxsus foydalanish uchun ijaraga olingan samolyotda parvoz qilish
regular flight organised by the company which owns the plane = samolyotga egalik qiluvchi kompaniya tomonidan tashkil etilgan muntazam parvoz
The opposite is a bumpy flight = Buning aksi - to'siqsiz parvoz
